long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust AO3 work's line height, font size, max width and indentation to make reading Chinese fanfics easy and comfortable, as AO3 itself does not support Chinese format much  and many Chinese authors don't adjust format, which has caused difficulty for a lot of readers to read.
